sn45.40:4.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you the spiritual path and the goal of the spiritual path.
sn45.40:4.4: And what is the spiritual path?
sn45.40:4.5: It is simply this noble eightfold path, that is:
sn45.40:4.6: right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right samādhi.
sn45.40:4.8: This is called the spiritual path.
sn45.40:4.9: And what is the goal of the spiritual path?
sn45.40:4.10: The ending of greed, hate, and delusion.
sn45.40:4.11: This is called the goal of the spiritual path.”
